DataElement.preferredName: Culture Procedure Multi-Drug Resistant Organism With Infection Assessment Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to a result with presence of a microbial by growing microorganisms that is not susceptible to standard antimicrobial therapies.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Culture Procedure Multi-Drug Resistant Organism With Infection Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a result with presence of a microbial by growing microorganisms that is not susceptible to standard antimicrobial therapies.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.

Concepts.definition: Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.

Property.preferredName: Multi-Drug Resistant Organism With Infection Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: A microorganism, often a bacterium, that is not susceptible to standard antimicrobial therapies.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A microorganism, often a bacterium, that is not susceptible to standard antimicrobial therapies.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms.
